 @param _lotteryId: lottery id

 @param _ticketIds: array of _ticketId
@notice Check if an address is a contract

params._ticketNumbers: : array of ticket numbers between 1,000,000 and 1,999,999

changeRandomGenerator(address).details: The calls to functions are used to verify the new generator implements them properly. It is necessary to wait for the VRF response before starting a round. Callable only by the contract owner

claimTickets(uint256,uint256[],uint32[]).details: Callable by users only, not contract!

params._brackets: : array of brackets for the ticket ids

constructor.details: RandomNumberGenerator must be deployed prior to this contract

params._randomGeneratorAddress: : address of the RandomGenerator contract used to work with ChainLink VRF

params._autoInjection: : reinjects funds into next lottery (vs. withdrawing all)

injectFunds(uint256,uint256).details: Callable by owner or injector address

params._amount: : amount to inject in SPHYNX token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._tokenAddress: : the address of the token to withdraw
params._tokenAmount: : the number of token amount to withdraw

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._maxPriceTicketInSphynx: : maximum price of a ticket in SPHYNX
params._minPriceTicketInSphynx: : minimum price of a ticket in SPHYNX

params._discountDivisor: : the divisor to calculate the discount magnitude for bulks
params._priceTicketInSphynx: : price of a ticket in SPHYNX
params._rewardsBreakdown: : breakdown of rewards per bracket (must sum to 10,000)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

viewRewardsForTicketId(uint256,uint256,u.details: Computations are mostly offchain. This is used to verify a ticket!

params._bracket: : bracket for the ticketId to verify the claim and calculate rewards

params._cursor: : cursor to start where to retrieve the tickets
params._size: : the number of tickets to retrieve

buyTickets(uint256,uint32[]).notice: Buy tickets for the current lottery

calculateTotalPriceForBulkTickets(uint25.notice: Calculate price of a set of tickets

claimTickets(uint256,uint256[],uint32[]).notice: Claim a set of winning tickets for a lottery

drawFinalNumberAndMakeLotteryClaimable(u.notice: Draw the final number, calculate reward in SPHYNX per group, and make lottery claimable

recoverWrongTokens(address,uint256).notice: It allows the admin to recover wrong tokens sent to the contract

setMinAndMaxTicketPriceInSphynx(uint256,.notice: Set SPHYNX price ticket upper/lower limit

setOperatorAndTreasuryAndInjectorAddress.notice: Set operator, treasury, and injector addresses

viewNumbersAndStatusesForTicketIds(uint2.notice: View ticker statuses and numbers for an array of ticket ids

viewRewardsForTicketId(uint256,uint256,u.notice: View rewards for a given ticket, providing a bracket, and lottery id

viewUserInfoForLotteryId(address,uint256.notice: View user ticket ids, numbers, and statuses of user for a given lottery

userdoc.notice: It is a contract for a lottery system using randomness provided externally.
